description:
Light, cool, and stretchy, this is just the dress for sunny summer days. Dressed up for the office, or down for a picnic, the Anya feels as good as it looks. Made from an ultralight material, this dress makes the heat a lot more enjoyable.

  • Lightweight recycled poly’ blend wicks moisture and feels airy against the skin
  • 2-way stretch keeps comfort levels high when on the move
  • Sash tie at the waist lets you customize your silhouette, or remove it for a cool comfort
  • Dual hand pockets use technical construction to lay as flat as can be
  • Laser cut ventilation at the bust to help keep you cool
  • UPF50+ stops more than 98% of harsh UV in its tracks
name: Indyeva Anya Dress - Women's
